title: Sea-Fisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Revocation)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Revocation) 

Regulations 2021.

title: Sea-Fisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: 2. The following statutory instruments are revoked:
text_raw:
2. The following statutory instruments are revoked: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

the Passive Fishing Gear and Beam Trawls Marking and 
Identification (No.2) Regulations 2006 (S.I. No. 341 of 2006); 

the Sea Fisheries (Tuna and Certain Other Species Fishing) 
Regulations 2005 (S.I. No. 353 of 2005); 

the Sea Fisheries (Tuna and Certain Other Species Fishing) 
Order, 2002 (S.I. No. 322 of 2002); 

the Sea Fisheries (Regulation of Nets) Order, 1993, (S.I. No. 264 
of 1993). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

12 November, 2021. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

1 OJ L 112, 30.4.2011, p. 1 
2 OJ L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 105 
3 OJ L 22, 25.1.2003, p. 5 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [602] 3

title: Sea-Fisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations revoke certain Statutory Instruments relating to sea fisheries 
which are no longer in force/redundant. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [602]
